decisions.name: PO_Line_already_at_status_8_no_overreceipt
decisions.label: PO Line already at status 8 / no overreceipt

rules.name: Cant_process
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2) OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR (7 AND 9) OR 8

rightValue.stringValue: Indirect Material is Authorized and Received in PO Authorizations

rules.label: Cant process

dynamicChoiceSets.name: POLines
dynamicChoiceSets.filterLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND (8 OR (9 AND 10 AND 11))

dynamicChoiceSets.description: PO Line choices Including Indirect material type based on PO Control( PO Authorization for Indirect material)
dynamicChoiceSets.name: POLines_ALT
dynamicChoiceSets.filterLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND (7 OR (8 AND 9 AND 10))

dynamicChoiceSets.name: POLines_Scan
dynamicChoiceSets.filterLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND (8 OR ( 9 AND 10 AND 11 ))

dynamicChoiceSets.description: PO Line choices Including Indirect material type based on PO Control( PO Authorization for Indirect material
dynamicChoiceSets.name: POLines_Scan_ALT
dynamicChoiceSets.filterLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND (7 OR (8 AND 9 AND 10))

formulas.name: Count_Serials
formulas.expression: IF({!Serial_Entry_Options}=={!Srl_Generate}, LEN({!Output_Text}) - LEN( SUBSTITUTE({!Output_Text}, ',', '') ) + 1, LEN({!Serials_To_Use}) - LEN( SUBSTITUTE({!Serials_To_Use}, ',', '') ) + 1)
